summary: Action required: Cluster-wide proxy network requirements not met
description: Your cluster requires you to take action because your cluster-wide proxy configuration re-encrypts egress traffic, and you have not excluded required URLs from re-encryption.  Your cluster's monitoring stack cannot function correctly until you exclude the required URLs from re-encryption. Without action, your cluster's SLA may be impacted, along with your ability to upgrade. For more information refer to the documentation: https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_openshift_service_on_aws/4/html/networking/configuring-a-cluster-wide-proxy#.
